      • startObserving

        public void startObserving()
        Description copied from interface: GLMapItem2
        Start observing the subject. This method should register callback listeners on any properties of the subject that would affect its rendered representation.

        Invoking this method should generally refresh the state of the item.

        This method may not be invoked on the GL context thread.

        Specified by:
        startObserving in interface GLMapItem2
        Overrides:
        startObserving in class GLShape2

      • stopObserving

        public void stopObserving()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGLMapItem2
        Stops observing the subject. This method should unwind any callback listeners registered via AbstractGLMapItem2.startObserving().

        This method may not be invoked on the GL context thread.

        Specified by:
        stopObserving in interface GLMapItem2
        Overrides:
        stopObserving in class GLShape2

      • uses2DPointBuffer

        protected boolean uses2DPointBuffer()
        Whether points should be stored in a 2D or 3D point buffer (if altitude should be ignored or not)

        XXX - We always need 3D points for hit testing to work properly with perspective rendering

        Returns:
        True to use a 2D point buffer

      • draw

        public void draw​(GLMapView ortho,
                 int renderPass)
        Description copied from interface: GLMapRenderable2
        Renders the content in the current EGL context for the given view. Initialization of the renderer may occur following instantiation or a prior call to GLMapRenderable2.release().

        This method is ALWAYS invoked on the GL thread.

        Specified by:
        draw in interface GLMapRenderable2
        Parameters:
        ortho - The current view
        renderPass - The render pass being executed during this invocation. The value will be the bitwise-OR of any of the flags:
        • GLMapView.RENDER_PASS_SURFACE
        • GLMapView.RENDER_PASS_SPRITES
        Only content valid for the specified pass should be rendered.

      • updateNadirClamp

        protected void updateNadirClamp​(GLMapView ortho)
        Sync the NADIR clamp boolean with the current clamp to ground setting
        Parameters:
        ortho - Map view

      • validateLabels

        protected void validateLabels​(GLMapView ortho)

      • getWidgetViewF

        protected android.graphics.RectF getWidgetViewF()
        TODO: Currently a direct copy from GLMapItem - but will be reritten / removed when the final version is done. Retrieve the bounding RectF of the current state of the Map. This accounts for the OrthoMapView's focus, so DropDowns will be accounted for. NOTE- the RectF this returns is not a valid RectF since the origin coordinate is in the lower left (ll is 0,0). Therefore the RectF.contains(PointF) method will not work to determine if a point falls inside the bounds.
        Returns:
        The bounding RectF

      • getDefaultWidgetViewF

        TODO: Currently a direct copy from GLMapItem - but will be rewritten / removed when the final version is done.
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        Returns:

      • _projectVerts

        protected void _projectVerts​(GLMapView ortho)
        TODO 4.4: Utilize the batch line string we already have instead of creating a duplicate vertex buffer (_verts2). Also should be noted this buffer is only used for hit testing and drawing vertices in editable mode.

      • release

        public void release()
        Description copied from interface: GLMapRenderable2
        Releases any resources allocated by the renderable as a result of the invocation of the #draw(GLMapView) method. This method will be invoked when a renderable that was previously being rendered is no longer eligible for rendering (e.g. a tile that is no longer in view on the map). The renderable may be reinitialized and rendered via a subsequent call to #draw(GLMapView) in the future.

        This method is ALWAYS invoked on the GL thread.

        Specified by:
        release in interface GLMapRenderable2
        Specified by:
        release in interface Releasable
        Overrides:
        release in class AbstractGLMapItem2
